AD_Incantation_Combat_01_0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_BhaalTemple_Reapers
AD_Incantation_Combat_01_0.text: Stalker of Gehenna's wastes... Take our zeal, take our blood!
AD_Incantation_Combat_01_0.context: NodeContext: zealous chanting of a spell

AD_Incantation_Combat_04_0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_BhaalTemple_Reapers
AD_Incantation_Combat_04_0.text: From blood we came... To blood we shall return!
AD_Incantation_Combat_04_0.context: NodeContext: zealous chanting, empowering your leader

AD_Incantation_Combat_03_0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_BhaalTemple_Reapers
AD_Incantation_Combat_03_0.text: Prostrate before your Throne of Blood... Heed our prayer, heed your call!
AD_Incantation_Combat_03_0.context: NodeContext: zealous chanting, empowering your leader

AD_Incantation_Combat_02_0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_BhaalTemple_Reapers
AD_Incantation_Combat_02_0.text: The Flaying Queen... An heir of Murder... Take our strength...
AD_Incantation_Combat_02_0.context: NodeContext: zealous chanting, empowering your leader
